message:
nested exception is org.apache.ibatis.exceptions.PersistenceException: 
### Error querying database.  Cause: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
### The error may exist in class path resource [mapping/InvoiceMapper.xml]
### The error may involve json.mapper.InvoiceMapper.selectForCheckRepeat
### The error occurred while handling results
### SQL: select                   xy_invoice_code, xy_invoice_num, xy_invoice_flownum, xy_invoice_cash, xy_invoice_tax,         xy_invoice_total, xy_invoice_type, xy_note, xy_buyername, xy_buyertaxcode, xy_buyerbank_account,         xy_buyertel, xy_salertaxcode, xy_salername, xy_salertel, xy_salerbankaccount, xy_odate,         xy_v, xy_r, xy_people, xy_rdate               from invoice         where (xy_invoice_code,xy_invoice_num) in ((3502182130,1054297),(3502182130,1054296),(3500171130,13013323),(3502182130,5190853),(035021700111,43823788),(2321234564,11321231))
### Cause: java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
